name: Sharpbibtex
tagline: BibTex is a great way of handling references for academic work but the support in word is lacking. This project aims to resolve that problem by creating a BibTexParser and an Office Addin for Word that Processes BibTex references off of Academic Sites
body:
#Welcome to SharpBibTex

This project is aimed at helping developers integrate BibTex into their projects as well as project a free open source solution for academics to capture Bibtex references directly into MS Word 2016 and Higher. 

Check out the Wiki on GitHub for more details..

This site will be updated as it is submitted and changed
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
